title: Do they keep the rain gauge at Wilmington airport under an umbrella? This area has been inundated with rain over the past few days. The entire region is under a flood watch. My own rain gauge has recorded nearly 10\ since Friday. Yet the statistics in the Almanac have shown only about 0.5\" each of the last 2 days. How can that be?"
